title: Mister Prime Minister: Joseph Benedict Chifley

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Chifley, J. B. (Joseph Benedict), 1885-1951
description: The life and political career of J.B. Chifley, Prime Minister of Australia 1945-1949. Covers his early life and rise through the ranks of the ALP; notes the record amount of legislation passed furing his term of office, and presents interviews with associates. Narrated by Roger Climpson. Suitable for secondary level.
